name: Shubhangee .

about: Shubhangee is currently pursuing her MBA at IIM Kozhikode. She holds a bachelor's  degree in Mechanical Engineering from NIT Durgapur.With her experience as a Management Trainee Technical at TATA Steel, she has successfully managed teams, spearheaded technical projects, and achieved operational excellence. Alongside her professional pursuits, Shubhangee has a passion for Hindustani vocal music and finds joy in singing. Additionally, she indulges in her culinary skills by cooking and loves exploring new destinations through travel.

recommendations: Shubham Singh “Shubhangee was working as my colleague at Tata Steel.I had the pleasure of collaborating with her during our participation in the TechX,tech exhibition organized by SNTI, Tata Steel.Throughout the project, Shubhangee displayed an exceptional level of dedication and worked tirelessly to ensure its success. Her remarkable leadership skills were evident as she efficiently coordinated among team members. Her calm demeanor and composed approach allowed her to navigate difficult circumstances with ease, always striving to find optimal solutions to the problems at hand. She exhibited an innate talent for problem-solving, effectively analyzing complex issues and devising innovative strategies to overcome them. I wholeheartedly recommend her for any future endeavors where her leadership skills, ability to handle pressure, and exceptional problem-solving aptitude will undoubtedly contribute to outstanding outcomes.”

Gaurav Kumar “I am pleased to write this recommendation for Shubhangee based on our collaborative work during a research paper and her internship at IIT Guwahati. During our time working together on the research paper, Shubhangee demonstrated great skills and dedication. She exhibited a profound understanding of fluid mechanics, and her contributions significantly enriched the project. Her ability to grasp complex concepts and her analytical thinking was truly commendable. Moreover, Shubhangee's attention to detail and rigorous approach to her work ensured the accuracy and reliability of the results we obtained. Beyond her professional abilities, Shubhangee is a pleasure to work with. She is a team player who listens attentively to others' perspectives and actively contributes to discussions. Her positive attitude and willingness to collaborate make her a valuable asset to any team. Based on my experience working with Shubhangee, I have no doubt that she possesses the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in technical writing and research. I wholeheartedly recommend her for any position or project that requires a meticulous and talented individual. If you have any further questions about Shubhangee's qualifications or experience, please feel free to reach out to me. I am confident that she will continue to make significant contributions in her future endeavors.”
